question: This has wings but it cannot fly, it is big, tall and mighty, it runs fast and it is truly the king of the flock.
I have no doors but I have keys, I have no rooms but I do have a space, you can enter but you can never leave. What am I?
What do you find at the end of the line?
What is the only 5 letter word that becomes larger when you add the letter “r” to it?
